I'm using VS2012 Professional on Windows 7.

I've installed GalaSoft.MvvmLight.4.1.24.0.msi and GalaSoft.MvvmLight.4.0.23.4.msi but none of them does install the MVVM Light template. When I go to Extensions and Updates, there is no MVVM light.

Have you restarted Visual Studio?  Also, the templates are for C# only.

Chuck
I have the same issue -- Visual Studio 2010 Ultimate running on Windows 8 Pro x64.  I quit VS2012, ran the installer, then started VS2012 and no templates were installed for C#.

DUH!  Brain-drain alert!

Go to the MVVM Light in the Start Menu, open up the Vsix folder and install the appropriate file.
